class.name: wxMenuBar
class.description: A menu bar is a series of menus accessible from the top of a frame.

flag.name: wxMB_DOCKABLE
flag.description: The menu bar can be detached (wxGTK only).

class.name: wxMenu
class.description: A menu is a popup (or pull down) list of items, one of which may be selected before the menu goes away (clicking elsewhere dismisses the menu).

text.name: label
text.description: Menu's label (default: empty, but required for menus other than popup menus).

text.name: help
text.description: Help shown in statusbar when the menu is selected (only for submenus of another wxMenu, default: none).

bool.name: enabled
bool.description: Is the submenu item enabled (only for submenus of another wxMenu, default: 1)?

class.name: wxMenuItem
class.description: A menu item represents an item in a menu.

bitmap.name: bitmap
bitmap.description: Bitmap to show with the item (default: none).

bitmap.name: bitmap2
bitmap.label: Checked bitmap
bitmap.description: Bitmap for the checked state (wxMSW, if checkable; default: none).

flag.name: wxITEM_RADIO
flag.description: A checkable menu item which makes part of a radio group of menu items each of which is automatically unchecked whenever another menu item in the group is checked.

flag.name: wxITEM_CHECK
flag.description: A checkable menu item (such menu item stays pressed after it had been toggled)

text.name: help
text.description: Help shown in statusbar when the item is selected (default: none).

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_MENU_SELECTED
type.description: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_MENU_SELECTED command, which is generated by a menu item.

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_MENU_RANGE
type.description: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_MENU_RANGE command, which is generated by a range of menu items.

type.name: wxEVT_MENU_OPEN
type.description: A menu is about to be opened. On Windows, this is only sent once for each navigation of the menubar (up until all menus have closed).

type.name: wxEVT_MENU_CLOSE
type.description: A menu has been just closed.

type.name: wxEVT_MENU_HIGHLIGHT
type.description: The menu item with the specified id has been highlighted: used to show help prompts in the status bar by wxFrame.
